In this paragraph, the following entities are mentioned:

* LUMO offset: This refers to the energy difference between the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) of a molecule or material.
* mixing morphology: This refers to the way in which the polymer and PCBM (phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester) are mixed or combined together.
